content: what happened to the meta sheet on the spreadsheets. do we need to list the element order anymore?

I rewrote diagnosticerequest nee diagnosticorder and so new elements with w5 definitions. We had to declare the element order in the Metadata sheet I don't see a metadata sheet on the resource spreadsheet anymore
actually I don't recall where we did that, but I remember ordering somewhere
you could declare a proposed element order on the introduction tab to get the build to check it
but you do not otherwise have to do that
can't find the w5 spreadsheet what is it called?
where is the list of w5 values for the spreadsheet?

http://hl7-fhir.github.io/w5.html
Is where it appears in the published spec, so I guess the values are on the top.
How do I get the Financial Resources to appear on the W5.html page?

Paul, I think all you need to do is fill out the W5 column in your financial resource spreadsheets. Add in "who" on the rows that describe the subject, "what" for the rows that describe what the resource instance is about, "why"..., etc... the strings from the columns in the w5 report.
need an entry in the root too - classifying. might need to add a category in w5.ini for financial
I have the elemnts filled in but cannot see in w5.ini a pattern which could be missing for financial, perhaps something in fhir.ini?
The W5 report isn't even picking up the w5 values for resources which are on the list let alone ones which are missing from the list.
